description: Frode Grytten’s exquisitely crafted The Ferryman and His Wife follows a man joined by the souls of the people he’s ferried on his last day on earth.
author: Grytten, Frode / McCullough, Alison (TRN)

description: The smash-hit Read With Jenna pick about a woman who checks into a glamorous hotel at her lowest point and becomes swept into a stranger's wedding.
author: Espach, Alison

description: A Korean epistolary revenge thriller—A woman seeks vengeance on the boy she believes murdered her family, only to uncover deeper shocking truths.
author: Bak, Sulmi

bookname: It's Okay Not to Get Along with Everyone
description: A humorous and honest guide about protecting your energy and embracing that it’s okay not to get along with everyone.
author: Dancing Snail

description: Let Them—two words that empower you to break free from drama, judgment, and the need to control others.
author: Mel Robbins

description: An unforgettable story of love, loss, and choices—woven into a mystery with a shocking ending.
author: Clare Leslie Hall

description: A humorous guide to finding peace—cat-style. For anyone feeling stressed and needing moments of purr-fect calm.
author: Eleanor Abraham

description: A reflective collection of essays about reading and its impact, from the author of the beloved Hyunam-dong Bookshop.
author: Hwang Bo-Reum, Shanna Tan

bookname: Everyone This Christmas Has a Secret
description: A festive murder mystery: presents, family drama, impossible murders, and a deadly advent calendar of clues.
author: Stevenson, Benjamin

description: A dramatic fantasy about war, secrets, and survival in a world full of danger and forgotten truths.
author: SenLinYu

description: An epic novel of postwar Japan—an exploration of trauma, memory, and reckoning with history.
author: Tsushima, Yuko

description: An intimate exploration of the Louvre Museum through history, art, and personal discovery.
author: Sciolino, Elaine

description: A witty literary mystery exploring dating platforms, technology, family secrets, and identity.
author: Pek, Jane

description: A gripping espionage novel set during the fall of Saigon and the lives rebuilt afterward.
author: Viet Thanh Nguyen
